name: Overdrive (itch) (jackmaxwell, Mr. A Creed)
description:
Controls

A D  to move left and right

SPACE to jump

Press SPACE twice to rocket jump

T to shoot

The game has controller support, here are the buttons

Left stick to move left and right

A to jump

Press A twice to rocket jump

Right trigger to shoot

Description

You play as a guy robbing a bank. Keep moving and killing to increase youre adrenaline and do more damage.

Notes

If you find you cant move, its an invisible block (bug) just keep jumping. There isnt really a win condition (in theory it would be after leaving the bank (out the front)

If the guards appear to behave weird it’s because I made a way out scoped state system where the AI would patrol and chase and jump over cover. With that being thrown together on no sleep it ended up being pretty buggy. 

Huge thanks to my team member Daniel for all the amazing art assets and work creating fun mechanics. By the end he had made over 100 sprites and had also made  alot of sound effects, although due to time many couldn’t be implemented.

We do plan to continue work on it as we believe it’s a fun concept that would be very enjoyable in a polished form.
